articles.title: Indian men's team settles for bronze at Asian Table Tennis Championships 2023 - The Bridge
articles.description: Indian men's table tennis team ended its campaign with a bronze medal after going down 0-3 to Chinese Taipei in the semifinals of the Asian Table Tennis Championships.
